articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Japan leads Asia stock rally, dollar gains after blowout US payrolls By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: Japan leads Asia stock rally, dollar firms after blowout US payrolls
articles.content:
By Kevin Buckland
TOKYO (Reuters) - Asian stocks rallied and the dollar reached a fresh seven-week peak on the yen on Monday after blowout U.S. labour market data dispelled fears of a recession and … [+3437 chars]
